text: George Barris (November 20, 1925 â€“ November 5, 2015) was an American designer. He build many famous Hollywood custom cars, most notably the Munster Koach and 1966 Batmobile. Barris was married to Shirley Nahas from 1958 until her death in 2001. They had two children. He died on November 5, 2015, in his sleep at his home in Encino, California from cancer, at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Artists from Chicago
title: George Barris
